channel.title: shell on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in shell on Just a Memo

item.title: Bash
item.description: Bash设置 Linux .bashrc if [[ $- != *i* ]] ; then # Shell is non-interactive. Be done now! return fi # Locale export TERM=xterm-256color export LC_ALL=zh_CN.UTF-8 export LANG=zh_CN.UTF-8 # Perlbrew export PERLBREW_ROOT=/opt/perl5 PATH=$PATH:~/.bin:/opt/perl5/bin # Ssh login need password phrase once if [ ! -S ~/.ssh/ssh_auth_sock ]; then eval `ssh-agent` ln -sf "$SSH_AUTH_SOCK" ~/.ssh/ssh_auth_sock fi export SSH_AUTH_SOCK=~/.ssh/ssh_auth_sock ssh-add -l > /dev/null || ssh-add Mac OS .bashrc

item.title: My_Scripts
item.description: rysnc cif to local ~/.bin/rysnc_cifs.sh #!/bin/bash sudo umount -f /mnt/cifs/* ||true sudo mount /mnt/cifs/vipdoc if test $? -eq 0; then #sucessfull mount echo "mounted /mnt/cifs/vipdoc" echo "rsync /mnt/cifs/vipdoc to /backup/tdx" rsync -az /mnt/cifs/vipdoc /backup/tdx echo "umount vipdoc" sudo umount /mnt/cifs/vipdoc fi sudo mount /mnt/cifs/hq_cache if test $? -eq 0; then # sucessfull mount echo "mounted /mnt/cifs/hq_cache" echo "rysnc /mnt/cifs/hq_cache to /backup/tdx" rsync -az /mnt/cifs/hq_cache /backup/tdx echo "umount hq_cache" sudo umount
